subject: Re: [junit] Suppress TestRunner output?
msgSnippet: ... No. I would simply redirect the output to nowhere using the command line. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
mike_at_ep wrote:

> Is there a runtime option or some other way to suppress the output
> from textui.TestRunner?

No. I would simply redirect the output to nowhere using the command line.
